tool_description: Analyzes market conditions, competitor pricing, and cost structures to recommend optimal pricing strategies for subscription plans across multiple market segments.

target_market.description: Primary target market segment (consumer, small_business, mid_market, enterprise)

competitor_prices.description: Array of competitor pricing data points

cost_base.description: Base cost to deliver the service per subscriber

market_conditions.description: Current market conditions (growth, stable, declining, volatile)

customer_sensitivity.description: Price sensitivity level of target customers (low, medium, high)

business_model.description: Revenue model type (subscription, usage_based, freemium, tiered)

geographic_region.description: Geographic market region for localized optimization

seasonal_factors.description: Monthly seasonal adjustment factors (12 values, 0.5-2.0 range)

promotional_budget.description: Available budget for promotional pricing initiatives

error_messages: Invalid target market: Must be one of [consumer, small_business, mid_market, enterprise].
Invalid competitor prices: All prices must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Invalid cost base: Cost base must be a positive number.
Invalid target margin: Target margin must be between 5 and 80 percent.
Invalid market conditions: Must be one of [growth, stable, declining, volatile].
Invalid customer sensitivity: Must be one of [low, medium, high].
Invalid business model: Must be one of [subscription, usage_based, freemium, tiered].
Invalid seasonal factors: Must provide exactly 12 factors between 0.5 and 2.0.
Insufficient competitor data: At least one competitor price point is required.
usage: Provide target_market, competitor_prices array, cost_base, and target_margin. Optionally specify market_conditions, customer_sensitivity, business_model, geographic_region, seasonal_factors, and promotional_budget for more precise optimization.

recommended_price.description: Optimized price recommendation based on analysis

competitive_position.description: Position relative to competitors (below_market, market_rate, premium)
